string.text: A strange place. The silent building surely keeps its secrets, yet it is not the structure itself that draws stalkers here, but the artifacts generously spawned in this area. You can score some valuable artifacts here — or easily lose your life... Be fast and precise, and luck will surely smile upon you.
A strange place. The silent building surely keeps its secrets, but it is not what draws stalkers here — artifacts are...

A bus and trolleybus depot located on the edge of the Zone. Tractors, buses, and trucks have frozen here forever... No artifacts have been spotted, but the place is popular among experienced stalkers who hunt down rookies and take what little they have. Seek cover inside buildings and behind vehicles, and beware enemies on the rooftops.
A bus and trolleybus depot located on the edge of the Zone. Tractors, buses, and trucks have frozen here forever...

A mysterious place with a strange pull... An experimental pool — who built it and for what purpose will remain a mystery forever. There are no artifacts here, so stalkers are drawn only by the remains of bizarre machinery and devices. Watch the rooftops carefully and remember: radiation levels here are extremely high.
A mysterious place with a strange pull... An experimental pool — who built it and for what purpose will remain a mystery forever.

A gloomy, abandoned factory. No one can count how many stalkers have fallen here. There are countless anomalies, yet the place pulls stalkers in like a magnet — all because valuable artifacts can be found here... Watch out for radiation!
A gloomy, abandoned factory. No one can count how many stalkers have fallen here.

This is part of a vast, foul-smelling dump where tons of radioactive waste were hauled after the 1986 disaster... Broken cranes, wrecked machinery... You can find remains of old structures and a massive hangar. All this lies close to the Zone’s entrance, and there are plenty of artifacts here — which attracts stalkers looking for easy profit.
This is part of a vast, foul-smelling dump where tons of radioactive waste were hauled after the 1986 disaster... Broken cranes, wrecked machinery...

An abandoned, God-forsaken village deep in the Zone. A small, shallow, rust-colored lake filled with the remains of vehicles inspires a subconscious fear of the Zone’s harsh reality. Beware of snipers, but remember — the Zone favors the bold.
An abandoned, God-forsaken village deep in the Zone. A small, shallow, rust-colored lake filled with vehicle remains inspires a subconscious fear.

An abandoned military base — trucks and APCs frozen in time, a ruined headquarters and barracks. Yet this emptiness is deceptive: the place is a true artifact Klondike, meaning the enemy may be waiting anywhere... Prove that you are the best!
An abandoned military base — trucks and APCs frozen in time, a ruined headquarters and barracks.
This old village is a grim and deadly place. But if you’ve risked making it here, be ready to take a bullet to the forehead. You can never feel safe here — only optics and a suppressor may save you.
This old village is a grim and deadly place. But if you’ve risked making it here, be ready to take a bullet to the forehead.
The city of Pripyat, once home to nuclear plant workers — or rather, what remains of it. The ruins of this industrial skeleton conceal very real dangers. Here, you truly must value your life.
The city of Pripyat near the nuclear power plant — a legacy of the Chernobyl disaster.
A small railway station attached to the Rostok plant.
A small railway station attached to the Rostok plant. Rusted railcars and diesel locomotives now stand here forever idle. Numerous artifacts lure desperate stalkers from across the Zone.

This factory, buried under heaps of metal and behind concrete walls, preserves a peculiar silence. In the last century, work once boiled here — laborers rushed to their shifts under loudspeaker slogans... But now the factory has served its purpose.
An abandoned old factory, buried under heaps of metal and behind concrete walls, preserves a deep silence.

The outskirts of the Rostok plant before Duty arrived. Grim places, yet extremely rich in artifacts. Empty hangars and warehouses conceal danger at every step. Be extremely cautious and pay close attention to the white tower...
The outskirts of the Rostok plant before Duty arrived. Grim places, yet extremely rich in artifacts.
